title: Add a Title Wrong Client
body: so today my lol stopped working so i uninstalled it ad tried to reinstall it but before i did this the game simply wouldn't let me log in and displayed a message close to were sorry we cant  log you in you may be offline and now when i try to install it it brings me to the old client witch is obsolete please help and where can i get to the new client?

replies.body:
When you're installing the new client you will briefly see the old Launcher from Legacy before it updates. That said, your 'may be offline' one is a completely separate (and unfortunately tenacious) incident that's been popping up a lot recently.

In case you haven't, check out a previous post we made right [**over here**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/OF00y8hA-were-unable-to-log-you-in-because-you-may-be-offline?comment=0000) to troubleshoot the issue. If the steps there don't help out, don't worry, Tech Support will look in depth with your issue in a [**private ticket here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). :)

Let me know if I can help with anything else, Max!
